Frequently Asked Questions

Find answers to the most common questions about our services, process, and pricing.

General Questions

DevExpress is a rapid development company that delivers high-quality digital solutions in just 24 hours. We specialize in restaurant systems, mobile apps, Android TV apps, and websites, helping businesses quickly establish their digital presence without the long wait times of traditional development.

Our streamlined development process, experienced team, and pre-built components allow us to deliver complete projects in just 24 hours. Once you place your order and provide requirements, our team works around the clock to deliver your project on time. We focus on quality and efficiency to ensure you get a professional solution quickly.

We handle a wide range of digital projects including:

  • Restaurant menu systems with QR codes and online ordering
  • Android TV applications for streaming and entertainment
  • Mobile apps for iOS and Android platforms
  • Restaurant websites with online reservations
  • Custom web applications and e-commerce solutions

Pricing & Payment

Our pricing varies based on the project type and complexity. We offer multiple pricing tiers for each service:

  • Restaurant Menu Systems: Starting from ₹15,000
  • Android TV Apps: Starting from ₹45,000
  • Streaming Mobile Apps: Starting from ₹55,000
  • Restaurant Websites: Starting from ₹25,000

All prices are transparent with no hidden costs. Contact us for a custom quote based on your specific requirements.

We accept various payment methods including:

  • Credit/Debit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express)
  • Digital wallets (PayPal, Google Pay, Apple Pay)
  • Bank transfers
  • UPI payments (for Indian customers)

We also offer flexible payment plans for larger projects.

We offer a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied with our work, we'll revise it until you're happy. In rare cases where we can't meet your requirements, we offer a full refund. We believe in building long-term relationships with our clients and ensuring their complete satisfaction.

Development Process

To get started, we typically need:

  • Project requirements and specifications
  • Brand guidelines (colors, logos, fonts)
  • Content (text, images, menu items)
  • Preferred features and functionality
  • Any specific design preferences

Don't worry if you don't have everything ready - our team can help you define your requirements and suggest the best solutions for your business.

Yes! We include 30 days of free revisions after project delivery. During this period, you can request changes and modifications at no additional cost. After 30 days, we offer ongoing support and maintenance packages to help you keep your project updated and running smoothly.

Absolutely! We offer comprehensive support packages including:

  • Technical support and troubleshooting
  • Regular updates and maintenance
  • Security patches and bug fixes
  • Performance optimization
  • Feature additions and enhancements

Our support team is available 24/7 to ensure your project runs smoothly.

Technical Questions

We use modern, industry-standard technologies including:

  • Frontend: React, Vue.js, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript
  • Backend: Node.js, Python, PHP, .NET
  • Mobile: React Native, Flutter, Swift, Kotlin
  • Databases: PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB
  • Cloud: AWS, Google Cloud, Azure

We choose the best technology stack for each project based on requirements and performance needs.

Yes! All our web solutions are built with mobile-first responsive design. This means your website or web application will work perfectly on all devices - desktop computers, tablets, and smartphones. We ensure optimal user experience across all screen sizes and devices.

Yes, we provide complete hosting and deployment services. We can:

  • Set up hosting on reliable cloud platforms
  • Configure domains and SSL certificates
  • Deploy your project to production
  • Set up monitoring and backups
  • Provide ongoing hosting management

We also offer training so you can manage your project independently if preferred.

Still Have Questions?

Can't find the answer you're looking for? Our team is here to help. Get in touch and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.
